nodes.text: Lapis Sheqoa was a Human male living on the planet Wukkar. He was a former shock trooper of the Imperial Stormtrooper Corps. He served as the Head of Security for the security forces of Black Sun Sector Chief Avrak Villachor as well as serving as his bodyguard. During the Marblewood Estate heist, Sheqoa was crushed by the Viliachor's safe and killed.
